product_name: Around the Edge of the Olympics on a Mountain Bike
long_description: Explore 24 scenic rides encircling the pristine beauty of Olympic National Park. Author: Dave Rowan. Softcover; 125 pages; black-and-white photographs and maps. Strong Spoke Publishing; copyright 2008. Rowan, an ex-logger, offers intimate knowledge of the logging trails around the park as well as a unique perspective on the recovery of clear-cut areas. Detailed, hand-drawn maps lead you through rugged country, and narrative descriptions preview each trail. Each trail entry displays distance, time, elevation gain, driving directions and corresponding map.
short_description: Explore 24 scenic rides encircling the pristine beauty of Olympic National Park.
